text.headline: Evolution of Large Language Models
text.text: An overview of significant milestones in the development of large language models.

text.headline: BERT
text.text: Developed by Google, revolutionizing context understanding in language.

text.headline: GPT-2
text.text: OpenAI's model showcasing transformers' ability to generate coherent text.

text.headline: GPT-3
text.text: OpenAI improved upon GPT-2, pushing the boundaries with 175 billion parameters.

text.headline: Jurassic-1
text.text: Released by AI21 Labs, marking another significant advancement.

text.headline: GPT-4
text.text: OpenAI's further advancement, aiming at more accurate human-like text generation.
